title: sonocarioca888
author: sonocarioca888
content: Hello everybody, i dont know if i can write this here, but if not is just tell meI am on Poker Business for a long time, since 2006 aproximatelyI offer Poker accounts for countries that are banned like, Qatar, Russia, USA, North Korea, Emirates, i will let the page below and can take a lookPrices are paid montlhy for me , and we have poker Rooms like 888 poker, ACR, Redstar, Betsson, we charge around $900 per account motlhy, then you need to be a player who earn more then that to make sense.https://www.rakebackpokerworld.com/rent-poker-accounts-2022Some people likes to get their bitcoins and play in our partners like bovada etc and cashout their bitcoins, paying montlhy rent accounts you can stay using and we always verfy, 2, 3 times each 6 months 1 year with webcam face, or mobile phone face

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: sonocarioca888 on July 17, 2023, 11:06:25 PMHello everybody, i dont know if i can write this here, but if not is just tell meNo, this place is actually not the right place for this. You should check on the left corner of the bottom of your thread, and you will see move topic. Move it to the service board, where you can advertise your service very well, and people who are in need of your service will contact you. But try making your portfolio a little more detailed so that people will understand how you operate and your previously concluded jobs. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=52.0

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Quote from: sonocarioca888 on July 17, 2023, 11:06:25 PMPrices are paid montlhy for me , and we have poker Rooms like 888 poker, ACR, Redstar, Betsson, we charge around $900 per account motlhy, then you need to be a player who earn more then that to make sense.You are in the wrong forum. You are not going to find clients for your services here. For someone to pay you $900, he should earn not simply more than that amount, because if he earns $1K, he is not going to play just to give you 90% of the profit. At the very least he should earn $2K or considerably more, and if he did he wouldn't be on this forum. In my experience there are quite a few people on the forum who have played poker and have an idea but don't reach that level of professionalism.

comments.author: Freedom4All
comments.body: Well, a real professional 24 cash table grinder knows his ROI. But a real cash table grinder will find a better solution then to pay $900/month just to play.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: There are poker rooms that accept players from nearly everywhere. For example Americascardroom.eu, Blackchip poker, True poker, Ignition, gg poker, SwC, and probably a few others. Americans can even play on most of these rooms. They accept bitcoin payments and wd in bitcoin if you wish. So, why would anyone pay you $900 a month for an account lmao. You must just be praying people are stupid.
